section.description: You can reference page variables in the events in a dialog component by using the "PageVariables" prefix. For example, assume that you have a page that is loaded using this URL:

Assume that this page contains a dialog component. When the page is run, a variable called custID is created with a value of "000001". Inside the dialog component's Initialize event, you could use this code:
section.example: dim t as P dim rec as N if eval_valid("PageVariables.custID") then t = table.open("[PathAlias.ADB_Path]\customer") t.order("customer_id") rec = t.fetch_find(PageVariables.custID) if (rec > 0) then customer_id = t.Customer_id firstname = t.Firstname lastname = t.Lastname city = t.Bill_city end if t.close() end if
